title: Drawing, "Design for Wall Hanging "Threads and Shadows"", 20th century
medium: Graphite, crayon, color pencil on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, right of neck:  Tapestry/Threads & Shadows; in red, yellow color pencil and graphite beneath drawing: various color notes; in graphite, lower right:  12 reed/3 = 39/3 = 39/1, 13/2, 26
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abastract Cubist design of head and neck using diagonal lines and irregular blocks of color.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Wall Hanging "Threads and Shadows"", 20th century.
20th century. Graphite, crayon, color pencil on white wove paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-94.
